EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed: Pivotal Mixer - Seattle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering to attend our event on Thursday, January 29. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, January 29, 2015 Time: 6:00 - 9:00PM Location: Elysian Brewing Company <https://www.google.com/maps/place/1516+2nd+Ave,+Seattle,+WA+98101/@47.6098996,-122.338923,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x54906ab3110ee8dd:0x440b9f566952e553>, 1516 2nd Avenue, Seattle, WA 98101
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Email us <mailto:info@pivotal.io>!
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
